duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic preclinical safety expertise and representation for clinical development programs from IND through post-marketing.
Serve as Preclinical Safety Subteam Leader for multiple programs.
Ensure alignment of preclinical safety plan with the clinical development plan, regulatory guidelines, modality, and program objectives.
Collaborate with other functional groups on program-related tasks and objectives.
Apply understanding of toxicology, pharmacology, DMPK, and regulatory sciences to design toxicology studies.
Prepare high-quality nonclinical regulatory documents to support regulatory submissions, clinical development, and marketing authorizations globally.
Serve as a subject matter expert within their field of sub-specialization and provide input on other programs and studies.
May lead or participate in process improvement/modernization subcommittees and represent the company on external scientific committees and industry working groups.
Provide mentorship to less experienced toxicologists and scientists within and outside of the Preclinical Safety Department.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. or equivalent in Toxicology or closely related field. Board certification preferred.
